Uses of Class
org.apache.mesos.Protos.Status

  • Packages that use Protos.Status 
    Package Description
    org.apache.mesos  

    • Uses of Protos.Status in org.apache.mesos

      Methods in org.apache.mesos that return Protos.Status 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Protos.Status MesosSchedulerDriver.abort() 
      Protos.Status SchedulerDriver.abort()
      Aborts the driver so that no more callbacks can be made to the scheduler.
      Protos.Status MesosExecutorDriver.abort() 
      Protos.Status ExecutorDriver.abort()
      Aborts the driver so that no more callbacks can be made to the executor.
      Protos.Status MesosSchedulerDriver.acceptOffers(Collection<Protos.OfferID> offerIds, Collection<Protos.Offer.Operation> operations, Protos.Filters filters) 
      Protos.Status SchedulerDriver.acceptOffers(Collection<Protos.OfferID> offerIds, Collection<Protos.Offer.Operation> operations, Protos.Filters filters)
      Accepts the given offers and performs a sequence of operations on those accepted offers.
      Protos.Status MesosSchedulerDriver.acknowledgeStatusUpdate(Protos.TaskStatus status) 
      Protos.Status SchedulerDriver.acknowledgeStatusUpdate(Protos.TaskStatus status)
      Acknowledges the status update.
      Protos.Status MesosSchedulerDriver.declineOffer(Protos.OfferID offerId) 
      Protos.Status SchedulerDriver.declineOffer(Protos.OfferID offerId)
      Declines an offer in its entirety.
      Protos.Status MesosSchedulerDriver.declineOffer(Protos.OfferID offerId, Protos.Filters filters) 
      Protos.Status SchedulerDriver.declineOffer(Protos.OfferID offerId, Protos.Filters filters)
      Declines an offer in its entirety and applies the specified filters on the resources (see mesos.proto for a description of Filters).
      Protos.Status MesosSchedulerDriver.join() 
      Protos.Status SchedulerDriver.join()
      Waits for the driver to be stopped or aborted, possibly blocking the current thread indefinitely.
      Protos.Status MesosExecutorDriver.join() 
      Protos.Status ExecutorDriver.join()
      Waits for the driver to be stopped or aborted, possibly _blocking_ the current thread indefinitely.
      Protos.Status MesosSchedulerDriver.killTask(Protos.TaskID taskId) 
      Protos.Status SchedulerDriver.killTask(Protos.TaskID taskId)
      Kills the specified task.
      Protos.Status MesosSchedulerDriver.launchTasks(Collection<Protos.OfferID> offerIds, Collection<Protos.TaskInfo> tasks) 
      Protos.Status SchedulerDriver.launchTasks(Collection<Protos.OfferID> offerIds, Collection<Protos.TaskInfo> tasks)
      Launches the given set of tasks.
      Protos.Status MesosSchedulerDriver.launchTasks(Collection<Protos.OfferID> offerIds, Collection<Protos.TaskInfo> tasks, Protos.Filters filters) 
      Protos.Status SchedulerDriver.launchTasks(Collection<Protos.OfferID> offerIds, Collection<Protos.TaskInfo> tasks, Protos.Filters filters)
      Launches the given set of tasks on a set of offers.
      Protos.Status MesosSchedulerDriver.launchTasks(Protos.OfferID offerId, Collection<Protos.TaskInfo> tasks) 
      Protos.Status SchedulerDriver.launchTasks(Protos.OfferID offerId, Collection<Protos.TaskInfo> tasks)
      Deprecated. 
      Use SchedulerDriver.launchTasks(Collection, Collection) instead.
      Protos.Status MesosSchedulerDriver.launchTasks(Protos.OfferID offerId, Collection<Protos.TaskInfo> tasks, Protos.Filters filters) 
      Protos.Status SchedulerDriver.launchTasks(Protos.OfferID offerId, Collection<Protos.TaskInfo> tasks, Protos.Filters filters)
      Deprecated. 
      Use #launchTasks(Collection, Collection, Filters) instead.
      Protos.Status MesosSchedulerDriver.reconcileTasks(Collection<Protos.TaskStatus> statuses) 
      Protos.Status SchedulerDriver.reconcileTasks(Collection<Protos.TaskStatus> statuses)
      Allows the framework to query the status for non-terminal tasks.
      Protos.Status MesosSchedulerDriver.requestResources(Collection<Protos.Request> requests) 
      Protos.Status SchedulerDriver.requestResources(Collection<Protos.Request> requests)
      Requests resources from Mesos (see mesos.proto for a description of Request and how, for example, to request resources from specific slaves).
      Protos.Status MesosSchedulerDriver.reviveOffers() 
      Protos.Status SchedulerDriver.reviveOffers()
      Removes all filters, previously set by the framework (via SchedulerDriver.launchTasks(java.util.Collection<org.apache.mesos.Protos.OfferID>, java.util.Collection<org.apache.mesos.Protos.TaskInfo>, org.apache.mesos.Protos.Filters)).
      Protos.Status MesosSchedulerDriver.run() 
      Protos.Status SchedulerDriver.run()
      Starts and immediately joins (i.e., blocks on) the driver.
      Protos.Status MesosExecutorDriver.run() 
      Protos.Status ExecutorDriver.run()
      Starts and immediately joins (i.e., blocks on) the driver.
      Protos.Status MesosExecutorDriver.sendFrameworkMessage(byte[] data) 
      Protos.Status ExecutorDriver.sendFrameworkMessage(byte[] data)
      Sends a message to the framework scheduler.
      Protos.Status MesosSchedulerDriver.sendFrameworkMessage(Protos.ExecutorID executorId, Protos.SlaveID slaveId, byte[] data) 
      Protos.Status SchedulerDriver.sendFrameworkMessage(Protos.ExecutorID executorId, Protos.SlaveID slaveId, byte[] data)
      Sends a message from the framework to one of its executors.
      Protos.Status MesosExecutorDriver.sendStatusUpdate(Protos.TaskStatus status) 
      Protos.Status ExecutorDriver.sendStatusUpdate(Protos.TaskStatus status)
      Sends a status update to the framework scheduler, retrying as necessary until an acknowledgement has been received or the executor is terminated (in which case, a TASK_LOST status update will be sent).
      Protos.Status MesosSchedulerDriver.start() 
      Protos.Status SchedulerDriver.start()
      Starts the scheduler driver.
      Protos.Status MesosExecutorDriver.start()
      See ExecutorDriver for descriptions of these.
      Protos.Status ExecutorDriver.start()
      Starts the executor driver.
      Protos.Status MesosSchedulerDriver.stop() 
      Protos.Status SchedulerDriver.stop()
      Stops the scheduler driver assuming no failover.
      Protos.Status MesosExecutorDriver.stop() 
      Protos.Status ExecutorDriver.stop()
      Stops the executor driver.
      Protos.Status MesosSchedulerDriver.stop(boolean failover) 
      Protos.Status SchedulerDriver.stop(boolean failover)
      Stops the scheduler driver.
      Protos.Status MesosSchedulerDriver.suppressOffers() 
      Protos.Status SchedulerDriver.suppressOffers()
      Inform Mesos master to stop sending offers to the framework.
      static Protos.Status Protos.Status.valueOf(com.google.protobuf.Descriptors.EnumValueDescriptor desc) 
      static Protos.Status Protos.Status.valueOf(int value) 
      static Protos.Status Protos.Status.valueOf(String name)
      Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.
      static Protos.Status[] Protos.Status.values()
      Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.
